name: Toggle left menu in Seesmic Web
caption: feedback.seesmic.com
description: Toggle left menu in Seesmic Web                                I'd really love a button that toggles the left menu (show/hide) so I have more space for the tabs. Though I'm running wide screens home and at work, they're never wide enough, so I always hide the left menu from Seesmic Web using the Dom...
